Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel with base of one handle surviving, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and very faint traces of a red-painted cursive text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394887) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394887)
